name: Drifting Away (Silvano.dja)
description:
Hi!

This is a pre-release build, art and effects are not final, some bugs are expected. We hope you'll enjoy it!

Objective

You must try to survive, as long as you can, with your friends on this lost spaceship. Be careful with alien invasions!

Story

After a strange impact your spaceship was sent far away from home and now, with a malfunctioning  navigation system, surviving is the only way to get answers and maybe, just maybe,  get back home... 

Mechanics

Survive by doing chores, completing minigames! Destroy asteroids, defent the spaceship from aliens, make more oxygen, and many other tasks!
Be careful with how you manage your tasks, doing it wrong, or just not doing it on time, will damage your spaceship!
As the time goes, the cycles will pass and the game will become more difficult.
See a Tutorial Here!
We recommend a 3 player party.

Controls

WASD to move your character;

E to interact;

Mouse to interact with minigames and menu.

Members

Gabriel Muller and Marcos Andrade as the Programmers;

Luana Bandeira as the Character and U.I Artist,;

Samuel Alves as the Background Artist;

Gustavo Cavalcante as the Compositor (BGM and SFX) and High Res Artist;

Silvano Araújo as the Producer, Game Designer and Concept Artist.

BE SURE TO USE THE SAME VERSION AS THE OTHER PLAYERS!

Thanks for playing!
